div.p: ANTONIO: Now that you know more about the phases, let's take another look at our drinking choices.
ANTONIO: Earlier you had the opportunity to complete a calendar of how many drinks you consume in a week.
ANTONIO: If you didn't fill out your calendar then, we're giving you a second chance. If you did fill out a calendar, let's take another look at your choices.
ANTONIO: Remember, one drink = .6 ounce of pure alcohol, not just one glass.
